scripts.watch:lightdm: mkdir -p live/lightdm && rm -rf live/lightdm/* && cp -r public/* live/lightdm/ && parcel src/index.html --dist-dir live/lightdm --public-url ./
scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && rm -rf dist/* && parcel build src/index.html --dist-dir dist --public-url ./ && cp -r public/* dist/
